text: Anoectochilus sandvicensis (also called Hawaii jewel-orchid) is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to Hawaii.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families It is threatened by habitat loss.Bruegmann, M.M. & Caraway, V. 2003. Anoectochilus sandvicensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. It is found in the Haleakala National Park.University of Hawaii, Hynson Laboratory, Co-invasions of mycorrhizal fungi and their host plants, Island Biogeography of Fungi == References == sandvicensis Category:Endemic flora of Hawaii Category:Biota of Maui Category:Orchids of Oceania Category:Orchids of the United States ~ Category:Plants described in 1840 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Anoectochilus sandvicensis
